name: 不落城-Unconquered Castle
description: A Visual Novel Game. The story which happens thousand years after that "God's one day world". It's a story telling two brave girls who saved their city.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Inter Core I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GT6404 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 10 Processor: Inter Core I7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5 GB available space
